3.「アーニア よく聞け。| お前の修練の成果や 実力を かんがみて| 次の研究発表: Arnia. In light of your training and your|ability, if you fail to produce results in|your next presentation...

4.「お前を この研究院から| 追放することが 決定した。: It is my decision to expel you from this|institute.

7.「……努力する者は 支援する。| だが 個人的 かつ 感傷的な理由で| 歩みを止: ... Those who work hard are supported. But|those who stop for personal and sentimental|reasons are not necessary for the institute.

8.「アーニア……。お前は 神に見放されず| 大病から 奇跡的に 回復したのだ。|: ARNIA. You have miraculously recovered from|your illness, and God has not forsaken you.|You know exactly what you have to do.

9.<if_woman>「おかげさまで 無事に ここまで来れたわ。| ありがとね <: <if_woman>Thanks to you, we've made it this far|without incident. Thanks, <cs_pchero>.<else>Thanks to you, we've made it this far|without incident. Thanks, <cs_pchero>.<endif>

10.「ここ 前に シェリルと来たことがあったの。| だから もしかして……って思った: I've been here before with Cheryl. So|maybe... I thought maybe... but I was right.

11.<if_woman>「とりあえず 研究用の素材を 採ってくるね。| <cs_pc: <if_woman>In the meantime, we'll take material for our|research. <cs_pchero> will be waiting|there.<else>In the meantime, we'll take material for our|research. <cs_pchero> will wait there.<endif>

13.<if_woman>「<cs_pchero>ちゃん お願い！| このオバケを な: <if_woman> <cs_pchero>, please! Do something|about this monster!<else> <cs_pchero>, please! Do something|about this monster!<endif>

14.<if_woman>「おかげさまで 無事に ここまで来れたわ。| ありがとね <: <if_woman>Thanks to you, we've made it this far|without incident. Thanks, <cs_pchero>.<else>Thanks to you, we've made it this far|without incident. Thanks, <cs_pchero>.<endif>

15.「あのオバケ 今日は いないようね……。| お留守にしてるのかな？: That old fart doesn't seem to be here today.|Is he away?

17.<if_woman>「<cs_pchero>ちゃん お願い！| このオバケを な: <if_woman> <cs_pchero>, please! Do something|about this monster!<else> <cs_pchero>, please! Do something|about this monster!<endif>

18.<if_woman>「すごい！ すごい！| <cs_pchero>ちゃん 強ーい: <if_woman>Amazing! Amazing!!! <cs_pchero>, you|are so strong! Thank you. Thank you so much!<else>Amazing! Amazing!!! <cs_pchero> You're|so strong! Thank you so much, you've been a|life saver!<endif>

19.<if_woman>「それじゃ 私は 研究用の素材を探してくるね。| <cs_p: <if_woman>Well, then, I'll just look for research|material. <cs_pchero> will wait there.<else>Well, then, I'll just look for research|material and... <cs_pchero>, you wait|there.<endif>

20.<if_woman>「<cs_pchero>ちゃん 見て！| 研究素材の鉱石が: <if_woman> <cs_pchero>, look! I found the ore|from the research!<else> <cs_pchero>, look! I found the ore|from the research!<endif>

23.「……死相が出ていると 言っただろう。| 人の忠告は ちゃんと聞くんだな。: ... I told you he was dying. I listen to|advice.

24.「シェリル！ どうして ここへ！？: Cheryl! How did you get here?

25.「お前が 研究院を追放されると聞いて| いやみのひとつでも 言ってやろうと思って: When I heard that you were going to be|expelled from the institute, I thought I'd|say something nasty about it.

26.「……私も あなたに言いたいことがあるわ！: ... I have something to say to you too!

27.「王立研究院の門を たたいたとき| 一緒に 大賢者になろうって誓った……| あの:
When we knocked on the door of the Royal|Academy, we swore that we would become great|sages together... Did you forget that|
|promise?

28.「私は…… のろまで グズで バカで| なんのとりえもない ただの落ちこぼれだけ: I'm... I'm slow, lazy, stupid, nothing good,|just a failure, but you're far more stupid|than I am!

29.「自分の 恵まれた才能を活かさず| ふらふら 遊んでばっかり……！| 私みたいな:
You don't take advantage of the talents|you're blessed with. All you do is wander|around and play...! Have you never thought|
|about the feelings of people like me?

31.「お前の 戯言など聞きたくない！！| 出来の悪い 愚者のお前に 何がわかる！？|: I don't want to hear any more of your|bullshit! What do you know about it? How|could you possibly know of my suffering!

32.「……それとも お前は| 今でも 自分が 大賢者になれると| 本気で思っているの: ... Or do you really think you can still be|the wisest man alive?

33.「なれるよ。私は 絶対になる。| ふたりで夢見た 大賢者に……！: I'm not. I'll never... I'll become the great|sage we both dreamed of...

34.「ふっ 笑わせてくれる……。| お前は 大賢者になど なれん。| かなわぬ夢など: You make me laugh. You'll never be a great|sage. Your unfulfilled dreams are hollow.

35.「早々に あきらめろ。| 忠告だけは しておいてやる。: We'll give up early. Just my advice.

36.「シェリル……！| 私は あなたのこと 待ってるから| いつでも 王立研究院に: Cheryl! I'll be waiting for you, so come|back to the Royal Academy whenever you want!

37.「シェリルは 意志の強いコだったけど| あんな 冷たいコじゃなかったわ……。|: Cheryl was strong-willed, but not that cold.|I don't understand.

38.<if_woman>「ごめんね <cs_pchero>ちゃん。| 変なとこ 見せ: <if_woman>I'm sorry, <cs_pchero>. Let's go back|to the Royal Academy, shall we?<else>I'm sorry, <cs_pchero>. Let's go back|to the Royal Academy, shall we?<endif>
